Package com.deezer.sdk.player.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DeezerPlayerException
    A generic Player exception
    InvalidStreamTokenException
    Thrown when URLDecoder is asked to decode an invalid streamToken.
    NotAllowedToPlayThatSongException
    Thrown when Player is asked to play a song but user doesn't have sufficient privileges to play it on Deezer.
    StreamLimitationException
    An exception that occurs when the same deezer account is used on multiple devices.
    StreamTokenAlreadyDecodedException
    Thrown when Player is asked to play a radio song that has already been played.
    TooManyPlayersExceptions
    Thrown when Player cannot be created because too many other players are still alived.
